--- match_subpath_trail.sql
GRAPH FinGraph
MATCH
  (TRAIL (a1:Account)-[t1:Transfers]->{3}(a4:Account))
  -[t4:Transfers]->(a5:Account)
RETURN COUNT(1) as num_paths
--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    Graph:             0,
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 6,
      NameEnd: 14,
      Name:    "FinGraph",
    },
  },
  MultiLinearQueryStatement: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    LinearQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        PrimitiveQueryStatementList: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLMatchStatement{
            Optional:     -1,
            Match:        15,
            MatchHint:    (*ast.Hint)(nil),
            PrefixOrMode: nil,
            GraphPattern: &ast.GQLGraphPattern{
              PathPatternList: []*ast.GQLTopLevelPathPattern{
                &ast.GQLTopLevelPathPattern{
                  PathSearchPrefixOrPathMode: nil,
                  PathPattern:                &ast.GQLPathPattern{
                    PathTermList: []*ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                      &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                        Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                        PathTerm: &ast.GQLSubpathPattern{
                          LParen:   23,
                          RParen:   74,
                          PathMode: &ast.GQLPathMode{
                            Mode:      "TRAIL",
                            ModeToken: &ast.Ident{
                              NamePos: 24,
                              NameEnd: 29,
                              Name:    "TRAIL",
                            },
                            PathOrPathsToken: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
                          },
                          PathPattern: &ast.GQLPathPattern{
                            PathTermList: []*ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                              &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                                Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                PathTerm: &ast.GQLNodePattern{
                                  LParen:        30,
                                  RParen:        41,
                                  PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                                    Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                    GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                                      NamePos: 31,
                                      NameEnd: 33,
                                      Name:    "a1",
                                    },
                                    IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                                      IsOrColon:       33,
                                      LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                        StartPos:  34,
                                        IsPercent: false,
                                        LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                          NamePos: 34,
                                          NameEnd: 41,
                                          Name:    "Account",
                                        },
                                      },
                                    },
                                    Filter: nil,
                                  },
                                },
                                Quantifier: nil,
                              },
                              &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                                Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                PathTerm: &ast.GQLFullEdgeRight{
                                  First:         42,
                                  Last:          57,
                                  PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                                    Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                    GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                                      NamePos: 44,
                                      NameEnd: 46,
                                      Name:    "t1",
                                    },
                                    IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                                      IsOrColon:       46,
                                      LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                        StartPos:  47,
                                        IsPercent: false,
                                        LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                          NamePos: 47,
                                          NameEnd: 56,
                                          Name:    "Transfers",
                                        },
                                      },
                                    },
                                    Filter: nil,
                                  },
                                },
                                Quantifier: &ast.GQLFixedQuantifier{
                                  LBrace: 59,
                                  RBrace: 61,
                                  Bound:  &ast.IntLiteral{
                                    ValuePos: 60,
                                    ValueEnd: 61,
                                    Base:     10,
                                    Value:    "3",
                                  },
                                },
                              },
                              &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                                Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                PathTerm: &ast.GQLNodePattern{
                                  LParen:        62,
                                  RParen:        73,
                                  PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                                    Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                                    GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                                      NamePos: 63,
                                      NameEnd: 65,
                                      Name:    "a4",
                                    },
                                    IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                                      IsOrColon:       65,
                                      LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                        StartPos:  66,
                                        IsPercent: false,
                                        LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                          NamePos: 66,
                                          NameEnd: 73,
                                          Name:    "Account",
                                        },
                                      },
                                    },
                                    Filter: nil,
                                  },
                                },
                                Quantifier: nil,
                              },
                            },
                          },
                          WhereClause: (*ast.Where)(nil),
                        },
                        Quantifier: nil,
                      },
                      &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                        Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                        PathTerm: &ast.GQLFullEdgeRight{
                          First:         78,
                          Last:          93,
                          PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                            Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                            GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                              NamePos: 80,
                              NameEnd: 82,
                              Name:    "t4",
                            },
                            IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                              IsOrColon:       82,
                              LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                StartPos:  83,
                                IsPercent: false,
                                LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                  NamePos: 83,
                                  NameEnd: 92,
                                  Name:    "Transfers",
                                },
                              },
                            },
                            Filter: nil,
                          },
                        },
                        Quantifier: nil,
                      },
                      &ast.GQLQuantifiablePathTerm{
                        Hint:     (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                        PathTerm: &ast.GQLNodePattern{
                          LParen:        95,
                          RParen:        106,
                          PatternFiller: &ast.GQLPatternFiller{
                            Hint:                 (*ast.Hint)(nil),
                            GraphPatternVariable: &ast.Ident{
                              NamePos: 96,
                              NameEnd: 98,
                              Name:    "a5",
                            },
                            IsLabelCondition: &ast.GQLIsLabelCondition{
                              IsOrColon:       98,
                              LabelExpression: &ast.GQLLabelName{
                                StartPos:  99,
                                IsPercent: false,
                                LabelName: &ast.Ident{
                                  NamePos: 99,
                                  NameEnd: 106,
                                  Name:    "Account",
                                },
                              },
                            },
                            Filter: nil,
                          },
                        },
                        Quantifier: nil,
                      },
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
              WhereClause: (*ast.Where)(nil),
            },
          },
          &ast.GQLReturnStatement{
            Return:         108,
            AllOrDistinct:  "",
            ReturnItemList: []ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.Alias{
                Expr: &ast.CallExpr{
                  Rparen: 122,
                  Func:   &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 115,
                    NameEnd: 120,
                    Name:    "COUNT",
                  },
                  Distinct: false,
                  Args:     []ast.Arg{
                    &ast.ExprArg{
                      Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                        ValuePos: 121,
                        ValueEnd: 122,
                        Base:     10,
                        Value:    "1",
                      },
                    },
                  },
                  NamedArgs:    []*ast.NamedArg(nil),
                  NullHandling: nil,
                  Having:       nil,
                },
                As: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    124,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 127,
                    NameEnd: 136,
                    Name:    "num_paths",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
            GroupByClause:        (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
            OrderByClause:        (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
            LimitAndOffsetClause: nil,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH FinGraph
MATCH (TRAIL (a1:Account)-[t1:Transfers]->{3}(a4:Account))-[t4:Transfers]->(a5:Account)
RETURN COUNT(1) AS num_paths
